sense.def:
To have an image of someone or something
pomeni v mislih imeti predstavo ali zamisel o nekom ali nečem.

seg.quote: To most people, the term ‘industrial revolution’ conjures up images of smoky steel mills or clanking machines.

sense.def:
The image of a person or organization
je način, kako drugi vidijo neko osebo ali organizacijo.

seg.quote: His attempts to improve the Post Office's image were criticised as ‘gimmicks’.

sense.def:
An image
je tudi slika ali odsev nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: He began to dress, never taking his eyes off his image in the mirror.
